identity.name: Bahamas Customs AI Classifier
identity.theme_strategy: Dual Theme (Dark Mode Default for focus, Light Mode for document review)

secondary.description: Lighter Slate - For cards and sidebars

accent.description: Electric Teal - For primary actions and 'High Confidence' AI scores

warning.description: Signal Amber - For 'Review Needed' or 'Medium Confidence'

bahamas_gold.description: Bahamas Flag Gold - Use sparingly for 'Premium' or 'Official' badges

buttons.primary: bg-accent text-accent-foreground hover:bg-accent/90 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(45,212,191,0.3)] transition-all duration-300 font-bold

visual_enhancers.textures: bg-[url('https://grainy-gradients.vercel.app/noise.svg')] opacity-20 mix-blend-overlay pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-50

transitions.page_load: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}

login_bg.usage: Full screen background for Login/Register pages with overlay

dashboard_context.usage: Hero image for 'Welcome' card or 'About' section

feature_worker.usage: Feature section or 'How it works' modal

general: Use 'Chivo' for all Headings (h1-h3). Use 'Inter' for body text. Use 'JetBrains Mono' for HS Codes and numerical data.
Implement a 'Dual Theme' toggle, but default to Dark Mode.
Use the 'Electric Teal' (#2DD4BF) for the primary 'Call to Action' and high-confidence AI results.
Use 'Signal Amber' (#F59E0B) for warnings or items requiring manual review.
Ensure all tables have sticky headers and are dense enough to show at least 15 rows on a standard 1080p screen.
Add a subtle noise texture overlay to the entire app in Dark Mode to prevent banding and add a 'premium' feel.

pages.login: Use the 'login_bg' image with a heavy dark overlay (bg-slate-950/80). Center the login card with a glassmorphism effect.
pages.dashboard: Use a Bento Grid layout. Top row: Key Metrics (Total Imports, Pending Review, Duty Saved). Main area: Recent Classifications Table.
pages.upload: Create a large, dashed-border dropzone. Use an animated icon when hovering. Show a progress bar for file processing.
pages.results: Split screen layout. Left: Document Preview (PDF/Image). Right: Editable Data Table with AI suggestions highlighted.

accessibility: Ensure all text on the dark background has a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1.
Focus states must be clearly visible (use a ring of 'Electric Teal').
All interactive elements must have 'data-testid' attributes.
